title: Ginger Turmeric Salad Dressing
directions: This salad dressing will give fresh greens an Asian flair.
In a food processor, pulse the jalapeno, turmeric, ginger, garlic, cilantro, oil, lime zest and lime juice until smooth.
Add to a small covered bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving to allow flavors to mingle
ingredients: 2 (1 inch) piece of fresh ginger grated or minced
kosher salt and black pepper to taste
